metadata.name: Suspicious Obfuscated PowerShell Code
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious UTF16 and base64 encoded and often obfuscated PowerShell code often used in command lines

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iaatagiaeabvahiaiaawahga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aalqbiahgabwbyacaamab4a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gac0aygb4ag8acgagadaaea')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ac4asqbuahyabwbraguakaapacaafaag')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('auaekabgb2ag8aawblacgakqagahwai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('algbjag4adgbvagsazqaoackaiab8ac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ahsamqb9ahsamab9aciaiaatagyai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('b7adeafqb7adaafqaiacaalqbmac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aewaxah0aewawah0aigagac0azgag')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ahsamab9ahsamwb9aciaiaatagyai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('b7adaafqb7admafqaiacaalqbmac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aewawah0aewazah0aigagac0azgag')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ahsamgb9ahsamab9aciaiaatagyai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('b7adiafqb7adaafqaiacaalqbmac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aewayah0aewawah0aigagac0azgag')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ahsamqb9ahsamab9accaiaatagyai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('b7adeafqb7adaafqanacaalqbmac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aewaxah0aewawah0ajwagac0azgag')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ahsamab9ahsamwb9accaiaatagyai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('b7adaafqb7admafqanacaalqbmac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aewawah0aewazah0ajwagac0azgag')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ahsamgb9ahsamab9accaiaatagyai')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('b7adiafqb7adaafqanacaalqbmac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aewayah0aewawah0ajwagac0azgag'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious UTF16 and base64 encoded and often obfuscated PowerShell code often used in command lines
